name: parer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small knife that is used to cut away a thin outer layer of something, especially fruit or vegetables: They had every knife you could ever need, from a parer for apples to a carver for the ham. Synonym
paring knife
More examplesFewer examplesPeel one of the oranges very carefully, using a vegetable parer or sharp knife - don't include the pith; you need only the orange part.The list of essential kitchen equipment included one bread knife, one meat knife, two graters, a wooden chopping board, a biscuit cutter, an apple corer, a vegetable parer and a can opener.
